Module count
Package count.ds

Class UPGMA

java.lang.Object
count.ds.UPGMA
public class UPGMA
extends Object
Direct implementation of the UPGMA algorithm (unweighted pair-group method with arithmetic mean), from dissimilarity/distance.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  UPGMA.ClusteringPolicy
    Different methods for calculating the distances after joining two clusters.
    static class  UPGMA.Dissimilarity
    Statistics to measure the dissimilarity between genomes based on copy numbers.
    private static class  UPGMA.Distance
    Pairwise distances to store on a heap in the clustering algorithm.

    Whether set edge lengths in clustering (true), or rather set all of them to 1.0 (false).

      public static double[][] dissimilarityMatrix​(ProfileTable table, UPGMA.Dissimilarity method)
      Dissimilarity values computed by arbitrary method.
      Parameters:
      table - profile table of copy counts
      method - one of UPGMA.Dissimilarity values; if null, default is assumed
      Returns:
